f
.
DEA under 38 U.S.C. Chapter 35
Whenever DIC is granted under
38 U.S.C. 1310
or
38 U.S.C. 1318
, the rating must address Dependents’ Educational Assistance (DEA) under
38 U.S.C. Chapter 35
.
Note
:  Surviving spouses granted automated
38 U.S.C. 1318
DIC must apply separately for DEA under
38 U.S.C. Chapter 35
.
References
:  For more information on
when to address ancillary benefits, see
M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, 3.A.2.b
, and
determining entitlement to DEA, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 1.A
.
